publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1748 Donald Gorrie: A Parliamentary Building Users’ Committee—That the Parliament urges the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body (SPCB) to set up a Parliament Building Users’ Committee with representatives of MSPs, MSPs’ staff, parliamentary staff and the parliamentary media to consider suggestions and complaints about the building and its management and possible use and to empower the committee to either make decisions or make recommendations to the SPCB.

S2M-1748 Donald Gorrie: A Parliamentary Building Users’ Committee—That the Parliament urges the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body (SPCB) to set up a Parliament Building Users’ Committee with representatives of MSPs, MSPs’ staff, parliamentary staff and the parliamentary media to consider suggestions and complaints about the building and its management and possible use and to empower the committee to either make decisions or make recommendations to the SPCB. Supported by: Margo MacDonald*
S2M-1748 A Parliamentary Building Users' Committee (lodged on 22 September 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-1748 A Parliamentary Building Users’ Committee (lodged on 22 September 2004) Mr Keith Raffan*, Alex Neil*, Robin Harper*, Chris Ballance*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Mike Pringle*
S2M-1748 A Parliamentary Building Users’ Committee (lodged on 22 September 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
